website_summaries.verdict: Highly rated as the “best” parenting book that absolutely transforms parents’ relationships with their difficult children.
pros: Reviewers experience dramatic changes in their children’s misbehavior and tantrums after applying this book’s gentle and loving techniques
Based on studies and is science-based, and not just the author’s opinion
After applying this book's principles, reviewers report a peaceful, calm household virtually free of yelling
cons: Some of the author’s strategies failed for parents of very strong-willed children

customer_reviews.title: a good challenge
customer_reviews.text: This book challenges me to be a better parent. It challenges me to take deep breaths, yes, but it also challenges me to teach my girls how to manage their own emotions by being a good role model. When I feel like yelling and using time out and sending my toddler to her room, I remember that she is just a toddler and is struggling to figure out the world. She needs my help. This book helps me remember that and also reminds me to take a step back and guide her through her emotions, not take her emotions personally or get sucked into them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: outstanding parenting book
customer_reviews.text: This book is fantastic. I found it encouraging as well as informative, and her insights are based on data rather than exclusively opinion. Even after reading through the book, I frequently re-read sections when I need a parenting pick me up- her insight always helps motivate me to do better. I highly recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: prev

customer_reviews.title: This SO important "loving connection" is the key to raising a happy child and in return creating a peaceful parent
customer_reviews.text: This book is a loving, common sense approach to child rearing. Dr. Markham explains the reasons behind her ideas rather than just stating what to do and also provides the much needed support that parents need to follow through via her web blogs. She guides the parent/s with practical advice on how to establish a close and loving connection with their child from infancy on through the teen years. This SO important "loving connection" is the key to raising a happy child and in return creating a peaceful parent. I would strongly recommend this book to any new parent and to every parent having difficulties with child raising. Dr. Markham is a goldmine of help and information.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Read This Parenting Book First!
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't been able to finish this book, I've already learned more about my child and myself in the few short chapters I have finished. I don't think you have to be a" Montessori" leaning mommy to appreciate this book. Every parent needs to read. The info in this book I have not run across anywhere else. I will most likely change my rating to 5 stars when I do finish and can attest to changes in our house (that are already happening)....
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pratt

customer_reviews.title: BEST. BOOK
customer_reviews.text: BEST. BOOK. I have ever read on child rearing. I have read so many books, that focus on behavior management and punishment without going to the cause for all the troubled behavior. This book gave me plenty of 'aha!' moments, never once making me feel bad for where I was at in my journey, but encouraging me along the way. My daughter and I are so much better for it. I see through her whining, tears, and demands. I can stop, breathe, and remind myself 'she is acting like a child because she IS a child.' and 'why am I triggered right now?' Cannot say enough good things about this book.
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly thankful for this book.
customer_reviews.text: This book honestly changed my life and my relationship with my son. The tools it has given me help me feel so much more in control of myself and like the parent I want to be. My newly three year old son yelled at me yesterday morning over breakfast and said, "I'm sorry I yelled Mom. I'm grouchy. I didn't mean to." I was so proud of him. It showed me how important all the work I've done really is. Like so many others, I was parenting the only way I knew how and this book showed me that there are, in fact, other methods that might create a relationship I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Insightful and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this book and Dr. Laura Markham practical loving approach. It forces you to reflect on your own actions and make changes so that you can model and guide your children effectively. I started implementing her strategies and I saw improvement in my toddler and preschooler very quickly. This was the first parenting book that really mirrored my own parenting beliefs and wasn't impractical or just plain weird. I highly recommend her aha parenting site and newsletters she is very insightful.
customer_reviews.author: gracefuljade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This book is so easy to follow, logical, and gives real life advice. I am a working parent and didn't think I would have the time or energy to implement a lot of these strategies. But I have found that it doesn't take much, is actually enjoyable, and has created a closeness with my son I am so grateful for. A wonderful shift has happened in our family and for that I have Dr. Laura to thank. Shani, mother of 2 1/2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: S. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Love Dr. Laura Markham
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough to praise Dr. Laura and her parenting suggestions. I had previously subscribed to her email newsletter (Aha! Parenting) so I was familiar with her philosophy and ordered this book. With her guidance, we have changed from a Yelling Household to a much more peaceful family. If you're willing to look at things from your child's perspective and to try something new, this is the book for you!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me 123

customer_reviews.title: Horrible behaviors were escalating from everyone
customer_reviews.text: This book was a game changer for our family. After a family crisis, we were lost. Horrible behaviors were escalating from everyone, worst of all our 4 year old. Everything we thought we knew about parenting no longer fit. This book put us back on track. Within 2-3 weeks we had a completely different child, because she had completely different parents. SO SO awesome. If you are struggling it is definitely worth a read!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel like the author gave obvious information. While seemed well researched but less practical for what I was needing.
customer_reviews.author: hooch

customer_reviews.title: Everyone can benefit from this book!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book and could not put it down. It helps to see the importance of prioritizing a true connection with each child. Within days of reading it, I focused more on connecting with my children and already can see a positive response. This book is uplifting and positive. We can change relationship and some behavioral problems with our children just by looking within ourselves...we are in control but this book helps you to find other ways to get through. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sue T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be an amazing parent, kind, calm and loving, well guiding your children in the best way. This is the book for you! Connecting with my kids before anything else has helped me so much. I would recommend this a read for every parent
customer_reviews.author: Blair Kiland
